entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
